pullRequest.title: Diff patch update
pullRequest.bodyText:
Pull Request template
Purpose / Description
Two dependency update fixups:

the annotations bump in last update was to the resolution strategy but not the actual dependency, fixed
the diff library switch in #6537 was inadvertently to an old version of the library, forward-ported to new version

commit.message: Alter annotations dependency, not just resolutionStrategy

Bump java-diff-utils version

I inadvertently ported to this library on an old version. Required
forward-porting to a slightly new API (they removed a checked exception)

nodes.bodyText: They removed this checked exception from the generateDiffRows API

Have we changed the exception behavior? Should we catch a general IllegalStateException?
It seemed to only be thrown in one place which was commented that it shouldn't happen: java-diff-utils/java-diff-utils@9a39411#diff-7d3112010afa1e008d62f83e622f386aL135 so we might be fine
Issue removing it: java-diff-utils/java-diff-utils#70 (comment)
